Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' occurs in variants that restart with a resubmission by the employee
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' is followed by 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' compared to all occurrences of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' in variants that eventually lead to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' relative to the total number of rejection activities (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR', 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER', 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' does not happen

Name: Number of variants containing 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' that include a loop back to 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' occurring after 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' compared to all occurrences of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' in declarations with case:Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' that result in eventual payment (i.e., are followed by 'Request Payment' and 'Payment Handled') versus those that terminate without payment
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' in the entire event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of all rejected declarations (any 'Declaration REJECTED by ...') that are specifically 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' in variants that do not involve any pre-approver or budget owner approval steps
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' occurring in domestic reimbursement claims (inferred from process structure described in the log description)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' events that occur as the final activity in a case without subsequent resubmission
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' does not occur
